title: FS: Walter Johnson hands at chest SGC 1 - SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS: Walter Johnson hands at chest SGC 1 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
SGC 1 Walter Johnson hands at chest.

Personally I think he is undergraded by half a grade.  Regardless, this is a really good 1.  This was graded after a scrapbook removal and I got it as part of a lot. You can see it still has a lot of scrapbook residue on the back and a very small loss on his collar. Otherwise the front is really nice.

Will consider trades for him but asking $SOLD shipped. Shoot me a PM.
